The investigation of the Church is the result of the joint work of analysts and experts. We are setting up a mechanism for the operation of oligarological corporations, anatomy of the preparation of colour revolutions, the structure of criminal ethnic groups. We expose the invisible facts and show dangerous tendencies, without resting with the Public Prosecutor ' s Office and the investigating authorities, the governors and the authors. We protect Russia not just by word, but by evidence and documents.
People, events, facts - you're doing the news that's happening around us. We're talking about them. It's a shirt on the most relevant events. Interesting stories and hot stories, boring interviews and bright opinions.
Developments of domestic, foreign and international policies, political intrigues and secrets, invisible instruments of public decision-making, negotiations, analysts of events and projections for the near future and promising trends, public figures of world policy and their "sertain Cardinals, plots against Russia and the uncovering of a domestic Fifth Column, all of which and much will be found in the policy division.
The Carrigrad's ideological department is a Russian factory. We don't open subcontractive intrigues, we don't invent bicycles or open America. We're returning lost meaning to obvious things. Russia is a great Orthodox Power with a thousand years of history. The Russian Church is the foundation of our statehood and culture. Moscow is the Third Rome. Family is a union between men and women. And their kids. A lot of kids. People ' s economy is the key task of the State. A task that cannot be solved without a clear ideology.
The Economic Division of the Carygrade Television is the only one among all the major media that rejects liberal-monetary principles. We are opposed to Russia ' s becoming a global system of peace-building, advocating for the economic sovereignty and independence of our State.
